unnormalised: **Smart Meter Rollout Gains Momentum in Maharashtra**
normalised: **Smart Meter Rollout Gains Momentum in Maharashtra**

unnormalised: Mumbai, Maharashtra – The Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Co. Ltd. (MSEDCL) is accelerating its smart meter deployment across the state, aiming to enhance grid efficiency and reduce Aggregate Technical & Commercial (AT&C) losses. A recent press release issued on 10/11/2024 outlines the installation of an additional 2 lakh smart meters by March 2025, focusing initially on densely populated urban centers like Pune and Nagpur.
normalised: Mumbai, Maharashtra – The M S E D C L is accelerating its smart meter deployment across the state, aiming to enhance grid efficiency and reduce Aggregate Technical and Commercial (A T and C) losses. A recent press release issued on tenth november two thousand and twenty four outlines the installation of an additional two lakh smart meters by march two thousand and twenty five, focusing initially on densely populated urban centers like Pune and Nagpur.

unnormalised: This initiative aligns with the central government's Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme (RDSS), which aims to modernise the power distribution infrastructure nationwide. MSEDCL expects consumers to benefit from improved billing accuracy and real-time energy consumption data accessible through a dedicated mobile app. The projected investment for this phase is Rs. 500 Crore.
normalised: This initiative aligns with the central government's Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme (R D S S), which aims to modernise the power distribution infrastructure nationwide. M S E D C L expects consumers to benefit from improved billing accuracy and real-time energy consumption data accessible through a dedicated mobile app. The projected investment for this phase is rupee five hundred crore.

unnormalised: A public awareness campaign is scheduled to begin on 15/11/2024 at 11:00 hrs to educate consumers about the benefits of smart meters and address any concerns regarding data privacy. A stakeholder meeting is planned on 20/11/2024 to discuss implementation challenges. The company aims for complete smart meter coverage by 2027.
normalised: A public awareness campaign is scheduled to begin on fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four at eleven zero zero hours to educate consumers about the benefits of smart meters and address any concerns regarding data privacy. A stakeholder meeting is planned on twentieth november two thousand and twenty four to discuss implementation challenges. The company aims for complete smart meter coverage by two thousand and twenty seven.
